name: gongback
description: Collaborative spreadsheet plugin for Univer Spreadsheet

scripts.build:packages: pnpm run clean:packages && pnpm --filter './package/*' run build
scripts.pack:packages: pnpm run build:packages && pnpm --filter './package/*' exec -- pnpm pack
scripts.publish:packages: pnpm run pack:packages && pnpm --filter './package/*' publish --access public -r --no-git-checks

author: Gongback
